safetyTips: We always wear face masks and follow strict hand hygiene procedures. Local delivery is by our own vehicle.
name: Beach of Deal
description: Beach is a home, interiors and gift store on Deal High Street, opposite Boots. We offer a wide range of furniture and homeware, candles, including Yankee Candle and Woodwick, Jellycat soft toys and a broad range of lighting , mirrors, and gift items.   Delivery is free of charge throughout the CT postcode area and we offer a free click and collect service.  Please see our website or call us for more information.
